name: Pig boi's adventure 2: Return of jerald
name_original: Pig boi's adventure 2: Return of jerald
description:
The pig is back! can he defeat the evil wrath of jerald and his new mutants? Find out in this sequel!

CONTROLS: arrow keys to move  space/enter to interact with stuff escape to enter inventory or just use the mouse for everything :P

WARNING: DO NOT ENTER IN ANY OF THE SAVE FILES THAT ARE ALREADY THERE
